titles.title: For the relief of Charmaine Bieda.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 1/29/2002--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to Charmaine Bieda in full satisfaction of her claims against the United States relating to her daughter's murder by her daughter's husband while they were serving in the U.S. Army.
